column4: ok you all have answered this question a billion times i bet but i i keep getting "make sure rfmon is enabled" when i type airodump-ng eth1. trying to crack wep passwords and its kinda hard when thats a key command
error for wireless request "Set Mode" (8B06) : SET failed on device wlan0 ; No such device
change wlan0 to your iface name
use ifconfig -a  OR iwconfig to find out iface name
thats my lan settings is it not? im currentl wireless and have a modem set up for wep cracking practice
correct my wireless name is eth1.
your wireless name is eth1? lol
haha i know that was default. im using backtrack 4 and didnt bother changing it. iwconfig says lo no wireless extension, eth0 no wireless coneection and eth1 has ieee , essid, and all the data
yeah backtrack4 does have a weird naming scheme
so you have any idea? if not ill figure it out eventually lol ill make sure to tell u so u can help othe rppl
what is it youre trying 2 do?
put your card in mon mode?
airodump-ng gives me an error saying make sure rfmon is enabled
if that doesnt work, then first ifconfig eth1 down, then iwconfig mode monitor
i got an error form that also
